## useResize() function

Subscribe to element's resize

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function useResize(ref: RefObject<HTMLElement>, options?: UseResizeOptions): DOMRect | undefined;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ref | RefObject&lt;HTMLElement&gt; |  |
|  options | [UseResizeOptions](./react-hooks.useresizeoptions.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> |
